root: ^Phew. Six solved cases in one day, that's got to be a new record.
^Heh, I should give myself a raise.
^Hey boss, I got the information to the constables.
^They'll make an arrest by the end of the night.
^The cat that was stolen out of the tree.
^Poor old lady was horrified. She thought they were helping her, but they just ran off with the cat.
^That's good news. That case was weighing on my mind all last night, couldn't sleep a wink.
^I didn't take you for a cat lover.
^I'm an empath for all living creatures.
^Oh, also, I picked up a few new cases from House Cherry Blossom.
^Our Lords are making efforts to lower the crime rates in the land, and as such, every minor case is being treated far more seriously..
^That's good, I think? I can get to those tomorrow.
^No worries, you've been working yourself hard today.
^You know, House Cherry Blossom could really use a talented investigator like you.
^Why would they need me when they have you in the family?
^Never a shortage of talent to be had. The more people on board, the more people we can help.
^You know my stance on Houses, Ariar.
^Yeah, yeah, you're all about staying neutral. I get that. What's that thing you always say:
^Ah, yes, 'One in distress can be saved, a house in distress cannot.'
^I understand, but if you ever do decide to join a House, We'd,
^I'd love to have you with us.
^How about you give me your sales pitch after we've finished locking up for the night.
^We'll go to Trello Tavern and you can give it another shot.
^Fine, but you should know, I'm being completely serious. You're wasted in your neutrality.
^Now can you turn off the lights? I'll get the door.
^Some sort of letter. It says it's urgent.
^Well in that case, let's open it.
^It's just an address and one word:
^Help. I don't know if we should trust this or not. What if it's a trap?
^You should go. I'll stay behind just in case something bad happens, you can call me.
^but don't worry, how many times have I let you die?
^I just want to stay that way.
^But what if you are right, and something truly is wrong. What if someone needs help, and I didn't come to their aid?
^If something bad does happen, and I could have helped, I don't know if I could live with that.
^Okay, I'll go. But be ready for my call in case I'm the next one with an urgent cry for help.
